title: KCET Counselling Doubt
content:
https://preview.redd.it/3rkwcxtz2bmd1.png?width=722&format=png&auto=webp&s=db45b199c900bcd20e7a83d089c1f3ce6341b2db

New notice just dropped -> [https://cetonline.karnataka.gov.in/keawebentry456/ugneet24/original%20document%20submissionenglish.pdf](https://cetonline.karnataka.gov.in/keawebentry456/ugneet24/original%20document%20submissionenglish.pdf)

What on earth is a BEO/DDPU? I was a CBSE student from 5th till 12th in Karnataka and I have multiple study certificates (not just 1 like the text here suggests). What are you guys doing? Do you have ONE single certificate that confirms your study in KA for >=7 years?

comments.body: Get it signed by beo just in case

Yeah 2 study certificates are absolutely fine. Just present them together during verification. Get the study certicate until 10std signed and sealed by the BEO under your school's jurisdiction. Similarly get 11th and 12th study certificates signed and sealed by DDPI falling under your school's jurisdiction.
So the BEO should sign on the study cert. up till grade X. and for XI and XII, the DDPI should sign it?
